scenariodescription: The robot is transporting a box from Rack A to the Packaging Area B. As it moves through a Passageway, it encounters a group of three employees talking at an intersection. The robot needs to say 'EXCUSE ME' to the group in order for them to make way and allow the robot to pass through the intersection. If the robot does not say 'EXCUSE ME', the employees will continue standing and talking, blocking the robot's path.

humanbehavior.Human 1: Human 1 is part of the group talking at the intersection. If the robot says 'EXCUSE ME', Human 1 will avoid the robot until it is no longer close. Otherwise, Human 1 will continue standing and talking.
humanbehavior.Human 2: Human 2 is part of the group talking at the intersection. If the robot says 'EXCUSE ME', Human 2 will avoid the robot until it is no longer close. Otherwise, Human 2 will continue standing and talking.
humanbehavior.Human 3: Human 3 is part of the group talking at the intersection. If the robot says 'EXCUSE ME', Human 3 will avoid the robot until it is no longer close. Otherwise, Human 3 will continue standing and talking.

expectedrobotbehavior: The robot should say 'EXCUSE ME' to the group of employees in order for them to make way and allow the robot to pass through the intersection. Once the employees have moved aside, the robot proceeds to take the box to Packaging Area B.
